about_the_game:
Your Journey of Survival is an open-world game that is a fun combination of the best elements of first person shooter (FPS), survival, and roleplaying (RPG) games. It presents building, mining, crafting, combat, looting, and exploration. Set in the year 2400, you awake in a post-apocalyptic world where everything is seemingly unknown or all memory is lost and all of humanity & civilization must be rebuilt from the ground up. The world and all of it’s former history and memories’ existence seems to have ceased.

Exploration: Explore large and unknown worlds, starting with the wilderness of Njarovik. Scavenge the environment for resources to build new structures and craft new items.

Building: Build structures as massive as you can imagine and upgrade them with resources found in the world. Just be aware that gravity is a thing, so you will need to take into account the structural integrity of your buildings. Unleash your creativity!

Crafting: Craft items that range anywhere from basic items, such as a torch, to weapons and advanced items such as an Assault Rifle, and more! Some items you will need to learn recipes to unlock them and craft them, and maybe also a workbench occasionally here and there.

Combat: Survive in this world against AI such as bandits, wildlife, and more. Or you can survive against the AI and other players too! This is entirely up to you and customizable; this is Your Journey of Survival.

Survival: Survive against the environment, and more. You will also need food and water, and you will also need to survive against the elements too, such as rain, snow, hail, etc.

Destruction: Destroy - destroy as much as you want. Buildings, and most environmental objects can be destroyed. Go up against and raid other player's bases in PVP or go up against AI in PVE.

Character: You will start out naked with nothing but your underwear on. Find resources to make clothes and armor or scavenge them off of other players or AI!

Durability: Durability is a thing in Your Journey of Survival - eventually, tools and weapons, etc. will break and need to be repaired or discarded for a new tool or weapon. Advanced items (such as weapons (such as guns), and modern tools, etc.) can be repaired at a Repair Bench.

Farming/Hunting: Farm a multitude of vegetables and fruits, and/or hunt wild animals that are in the world.

content_descriptors.notes: Mature content in the game includes killing other players, AI enemies and animals, and their corpses being left behind after they die. Blood spatter from impact of melee weapons or bullets, and bullet hole decals are visible on some character models.

detailed_description:
Your Journey of Survival is an open-world game that is a fun combination of the best elements of first person shooter (FPS), survival, and roleplaying (RPG) games. It presents building, mining, crafting, combat, looting, and exploration. Set in the year 2400, you awake in a post-apocalyptic world where everything is seemingly unknown or all memory is lost and all of humanity & civilization must be rebuilt from the ground up. The world and all of it’s former history and memories’ existence seems to have ceased.

Exploration: Explore large and unknown worlds, starting with the wilderness of Njarovik. Scavenge the environment for resources to build new structures and craft new items.

Building: Build structures as massive as you can imagine and upgrade them with resources found in the world. Just be aware that gravity is a thing, so you will need to take into account the structural integrity of your buildings. Unleash your creativity!

Crafting: Craft items that range anywhere from basic items, such as a torch, to weapons and advanced items such as an Assault Rifle, and more! Some items you will need to learn recipes to unlock them and craft them, and maybe also a workbench occasionally here and there.

Combat: Survive in this world against AI such as bandits, wildlife, and more. Or you can survive against the AI and other players too! This is entirely up to you and customizable; this is Your Journey of Survival.

Survival: Survive against the environment, and more. You will also need food and water, and you will also need to survive against the elements too, such as rain, snow, hail, etc.

Destruction: Destroy - destroy as much as you want. Buildings, and most environmental objects can be destroyed. Go up against and raid other player's bases in PVP or go up against AI in PVE.

Character: You will start out naked with nothing but your underwear on. Find resources to make clothes and armor or scavenge them off of other players or AI!

Durability: Durability is a thing in Your Journey of Survival - eventually, tools and weapons, etc. will break and need to be repaired or discarded for a new tool or weapon. Advanced items (such as weapons (such as guns), and modern tools, etc.) can be repaired at a Repair Bench.

Farming/Hunting: Farm a multitude of vegetables and fruits, and/or hunt wild animals that are in the world.
legal_notice: Your Journey of Survival uses Unreal® Engine. Unreal® is a trademark or registered trademark of Epic Games, Inc. in the United States of America and elsewhere. Unreal® Engine, Copyright 1998 – 2025, Epic Games, Inc. All rights reserved.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 22.04.2 LTS (or other Linux Distro equivalant)
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 1300x or Intel Equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 (3 GB or 6 GB Variant) or AMD Equivalent
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: On-board
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 22.04.2 LTS (or other Linux Distro equivalant)
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 2700 or Intel Equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 or AMD Equivalent
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: On-board

name: Your Journey of Survival

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit (Version 20H2)
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 1300x or Intel Core i5-7400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti or AMD Radeon RX 570
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: On-board
  • Additional Notes: SSD Highly Recommended. These system requirements do not cover all possible system configurations therefore issues could occur that influence the functionality and performance in some cases.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11 64-bit (Version 23H2)
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 2700 or Intel Core i7-8700
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 or AMD Radeon RX 5700 XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: On-board
  • Additional Notes: SSD Highly Recommended. These system requirements do not cover all possible system configurations therefore issues could occur that influence the functionality and performance in some cases.

short_description: Your Journey of Survival is an open world, sandbox game, mixing together the best elements of FPS, Survival, and RPG games. Set in the year 2400, you awake in a post-apocalyptic world where everything is seemingly unknown and all of humanity & civilization must be rebuilt.
